taskDescription: Declines interactive games and check-in calls
Block all data sharing with third parties unless explicitly authorized
Chooses to decline participation in interactive simulation sessions
Dismiss notifications about app updates without allowing installation
Set ALFRED to avoid initiating conversations or reminders automatically
Maintain strict control over what health and interaction data is shared
Rejects new app suggestions and additional features
Blocks unsolicited digital contact to maintain privacy
Feels overwhelmed by frequent social nudges and prefers minimalism
Reviews new app notifications on the ALFRED device carefully
Avoids unsolicited explanations or suggestions from ALFRED
Demands control over notification settings and data sharing preferences
Specifies no video calls, only offline formal visits with the nurse
Allows her daughter to contact her only through ALFRED's formal channels
